GET /api.description: serves up a json representation of all the available endpoints of the api

GET /api/topics.description: serves an array of all topics

GET /api/topics/:slug.description: serves a single topic object matching the given slug

topic.description: Code is love, code is life

GET /api/articles.description: serves an array of all articles

articles.author: icellusedkars
articles.title: Eight pug gifs that remind me of mitch

GET /api/users.description: serves an array of all users

GET /api/articles/:article_id.description: serves an object of the specified article

article.title: Living in the shadow of a great man
article.author: butter_bridge

GET /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: Serves an array of comments for the specified article, ordered with the most recent comments first.

comments.author: butter_bridge
comments.body: The beautiful thing about treasure is that it exists. Got to find out what kind of sheets these are; not cotton, not rayon, silky.

POST /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: adds a new comment to the specified article

PATCH /api/articles/:article_id.description: updates an article's vote count by the given increment

article.title: Living in the shadow of a great man
article.author: butter_bridge

PATCH /api/comments/:comment_id.description: Updates the body of a comment by its ID

DELETE /api/comments/:comment_id.description: Deletes a comment by its ID

responses.404: Not Found - comment does not exist
